ai-kv4.8:22.4_0: “Kassapa, the Buddha’s dispensation is falling in the dispensation.”
ai-kv4.8:23.1_0: Kassapa, the Buddha’s dispensation, about the spiritual life, and about the spiritual life.
ai-kv4.8:23.4_0: “‘This is the noble truth of suffering.’ Such was the vision, knowledge, wisdom, realization, and light that arose in me regarding teachings not learned before from another.
ai-kv4.8:23.5_0: ‘This noble truth of suffering should be completely understood.’ Such was the vision that arose in me ...
ai-kv4.8:23.6_0: When I had fully understood the visions of the past, future, and present arose in me ...
ai-kv4.8:23.7_0: ‘This is the noble truth of the origin of suffering.’ ...
ai-kv4.8:23.8_0: ‘This noble truth of the origin of suffering should be given up.’ Such was the vision that arose in me ...
ai-kv4.8:23.10_0: ‘This is the noble truth of the cessation of suffering.’ ...
ai-kv4.8:23.11_0: ‘This noble truth of the cessation of suffering should be realized.’ Such was the vision that arose in me ...
ai-kv4.8:23.13_0: ‘This is the noble truth of the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.’ ...
ai-kv4.8:23.14_0: ‘This noble truth of the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering should be developed.’ Such was the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering. ...
ai-kv4.8:23.15_0: When I was developed and cultivated, vision arose in me, knowledge arose, wisdom arose, understanding arose, and light arose, in regard to things not heard before.”
ai-kv4.8:23.19_0: “Kassapa, the Buddha’s dispensation is falling in the dispensation.”
ai-kv4.8:23.20_0: The discussion on unity is finished.
